Sourcegraph Cody Complete Review 2026

Enterprise-Grade AI Coding Assistant

What is Sourcegraph Cody?

Cody is Sourcegraph's AI coding assistant that combines code intelligence with large language models. It's designed specifically for large codebases and enterprise teams.

Key Features

  • Codebase Graph: Understands code relationships across large projects
  • Context-Aware: Provides relevant suggestions based on your entire codebase
  • Multi-Language: Supports all major programming languages
  • Self-Hosted Option: Can run on-premises for security
  • IDE Integration: Works with VS Code, JetBrains, and more

Best For

  • Large enterprise codebases
  • Teams requiring self-hosted solutions
  • Monorepos and polyglot environments
  • Code intelligence and search needs
